Alright, sorry I haven't been posting recently, and sorry about the big OOC message, but I need to get up to speed on somethings, and I have somethings I need to get off my chest:

1. Can somebody please catch me up as to what's happening with the Maximals, Blackheart's group, and....in general stuff.

2. All the hating going on here, I've heard these arguments dozens of times, "he's moding, why don't you punish him and not just me?" "Take it up over private e-mails." It's sickening, I say if somebody posts a message like that, ignore it, don't reply, just let it go, that is what the Council is for.

3. And this is kinda....well....idk, it's an advertisement. I created a new RPG, it's got the same rules as this place, with modifications, cause these rules are good. It's not Transformers, it's Superheroes. Here's a link: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ultheroesrpg/

It's basically set in the Ultimate Marvel universe, which means you can basically take any character you want and do whatever you want with them, there's very little continuity to deal with, because the official world hasn't existed for that long, please check it out, I want to start it off.



---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Mail Plus - Powerful. Affordable. Sign up now
--0-1433140385-1038529698=:8592

<P>Alright, sorry I haven't been posting recently, and sorry about the big OOC message, but I need to get up to speed on somethings, and I have somethings I need to get off my chest:</P>
<P>1. Can somebody please catch me up as to what's happening with the Maximals, Blackheart's group, and....in general stuff.</P>
<P>2. All the hating going on here, I've heard these arguments dozens of times, "he's moding, why don't you punish him and not just me?" "Take it up over private e-mails." It's sickening, I say if somebody posts a message like that, ignore it, don't reply, just let it go, that is what the Council is for.</P>
<P>3. And this is kinda....well....idk, it's an advertisement. I created a new RPG, it's got the same rules as this place, with modifications, cause these rules are good. It's not Transformers, it's Superheroes. Here's a link: <A href="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ultheroesrpg/">http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ultheroesrpg/</A></P>
<P>It's basically set in the Ultimate Marvel universe, which means you can basically take any character you want and do whatever you want with them, there's very little continuity to deal with, because the official world hasn't existed for that long, please check it out, I want to start it off.</P><p><br><hr size=1>Do you Yahoo!?<br>
